subject: THE NEWS FEED IS NOW WORKING!
snippet: Simply email <comm.hub.myco@gmail.com> anything newsworthy! Include "[CHAMP: News]" in the subject line to automatically post the email on the CHAMP website's news feed. Keep the rest of the group up to date with ease! -Cody
htmlBody:
Simply email <comm.hub.myco@gmail.com> anything newsworthy! Include "[CHAMP: News]" in the subject line to automatically post the email on the CHAMP website's news feed. Keep the rest of the group up to date with ease!

-Cody
